Text: Over a thousand seeders and not one comment? What are y'all trying to hide?  Anybody got an A/V rating, or other review? Is the soundtrack in French or English? Are there subtitles?  Why would I download a file that 1000+ people don't want me to know a thing about?

The usual dark cam (albeit watchable), French language dub, widescreen (640x264). 

A: 6 (French)
V: 6

Who in the name of Dave watches a film dubbed into French?
Oui Oui indeed.
Well, in case you didn't know, some people in the world speak other tongues than English !!!
True, but it's always best to have original language (not dubbed) wih subtitles. So dubbing a movie will probably b e for people who are blind or o lazy to read (^_^)

Yeah I agree, dubbing movies should be prohibited, a LOT of people worked in the sound engineering, mix and other stuff, so dubbing is like shitting on those guys work!! (include English dubbed films too)

So Macbeth, you want to get the movie for free - you don't want any laws stopping that - but you want to prohibit dubbing? What about you ripping off all those people that you care about so much by stealing this movie? Strange thinking.
